title: How to Install a K&N Air Intake Installation (Part # 57-3031-1)
description: See the easy steps to add more performance to a 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006 & 2007 Chevrolet (Chevy) Silverado 2500 HD/3500 and GMC Sierra 2500 HD/3500 models with the 6.0L engine.
tags: K&N Air Intake System, How to install, Chevy Silverado, Cold air intake installation

asset.title: 2001-2007 Chevy Silverado 2500 HD/3500 & GMC Sierra 2500 HD/3500 6.0L Air Intake Installation
asset.description:
See how easy it is to add more performance to the 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006 & 2007 Chevrolet (Chevy) Silverado 2500 HD/3500 and GMC Sierra 2500 HD/3500 models with the 6.0L engine.

http://www.knfilters.com/search/product.aspx?prod=57-3031-1

K&N dynamometer tests show an estimated 20.34 horsepower gain at 4894 RPM with use of this K&N air intake modification. 

K&N 57-3031-1 fits the following: 
2007 GMC SIERRA 3500 CLASSIC 6.0L V8 
2007 GMC SIERRA 2500 HD CLASSIC 6.0L V8
2007 CHEVROLET SILVERADO 3500 CLASSIC 6.0L V8 
2007 CHEVROLET SILVERADO 2500 HD CLASSIC 6.0L V8
2006 GMC SIERRA 3500 6.0L V8 
2006 GMC SIERRA 2500 HD 6.0L V8
